General.Name: Korean Drug Co. Ltd
General.Description: Korean Drug Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sales medicines for treating various diseases in South Korea. The company provides medicines for treating central nervous system and cold. It also offers prescription drugs, including antibiotic, antifungal, digestive system medicine, circulatory system, psychiatric, and central nervous system drugs; drugs for the urinary system, and skinantiviral. In addition, the company provides over the counter drugs comprising drugs for liver disease and cold medicine, as well as offers health functional foods. Further, the company offers xprugel, a transparent gel for disinfection of hands and skin. Korean Drug Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
